item.title: Seven booked for assaulting two police officers in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[A case has been registered against seven people, including a woman, on the charge of assaulting two police officers in Raichur district.
The police registered the case against the seven accused for assaulting an assistant sub-inspector and a sub-inspector in Mattur Tanda of Lingsugur taluk on November 11.
According to the FIR, Assistant Sub-Inspector Venkatappa Nayak was assaulted by the accused when he went for an investigation in a different case in which Mallappa Chavan was the complainant....]]>
item.author: Authors
